main event: A young man observed a round object with varied colors while boating in Honor, Michigan, on February 28, 1967.
interesting points: The object was stationary and did not produce any sound., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes., The observers included a young man who was boating at the time., A reliable local store owner was deemed a witness to the sighting., The area experienced surface inversion weather conditions at the time.
sighted object: one round object with varied colors
